database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Refined preparation and use of K-GG antibody enables routine quantification of ubiquitination sites

additional_fields.field: A protein modification that crosslinks the N6-amino of a peptidyl lysine with the carboxyl of glycylglycine, the two glycine residues left after tryptic digestion of ubiquitin.
